entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burwash Landing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:32 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -27.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burwash Airport 03:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -27.1°C
Pressure: 103.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -30.4°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
